name: balloon hoop package
description: Include a balloon hoop with choice of side or diagnal and 6 helium balloons.

name: starter package
description: Include one 1.5 feet balloon garland, 6 helium balloons and one customized bubble balloon.

name: Balloon Heart Package
description: Include a balloon heart, 1.5 feet balloon garland, 6 helium balloons.

name: Standard Wedding Package
description: Include two backdrop with balloon garlands attached to both sides, 6 artificial flowers centerpiece, and a 6 meter long aisle carpet.

name: Centerpiece package
description: Include 5 centerpieces with fresh roses and mix of greens.

name: Bud-vase arrangement
description: Include 8 bud-vase arrangements, each vase contains at least two stems and complimentary greens.(Deposit requried. Vases need to be returned after event.)

name: Mini Centerpieces - artificial flowers
description: Include 8 mini centerpieces, ideal for long tables. Need to be returned at end of event.

name: Balloon Stack Package
description: Include one balloon stack and 6 helium balloons.

name: Happy Birthday Balloon Stack
description: Include one balloon stack and 6 helium balloons.
